ARABIC: عَٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He is the Knower of the Unseen, and does not divulge His Unseen to anyone -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He is the knower of the Unknown, and He does not divulge His secret to any one
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He is the Knower of the Unseen, and He does not disclose His Unseen to anyone
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He knows the unseen and He does not allow anyone to know His secrets except those of His Messengers whom He chooses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The All Knowing of all the hidden does not give anyone the control over His secrets.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The All-Knower of the Unseen, and He reveals to none His Unseen."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The Knower of the unseen! so He does not reveal His secrets to any,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Knower He of the Unseen, and He discloses not His Unseen to anyone,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (He is) the Knower of the Unseen, and He revealeth unto none His secret,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He alone has knowledge of what is hidden. He reveals this to none,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He is the Knower of the unseen, and He discloseth not His unseen Unto anyone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Knower of the Unseen, He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] Unseen to anyone,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He (alone) knows the Unseen, nor does He make any one acquainted with His Mysteries,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (He Alone) the All-Knower of the Gha'ib (unseen), and He reveals to none His Gha'ib (unseen)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He is the Knower of the Unseen and does not disclose His Unseen to anyone,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The Knower of the Invisible; He does not disclose His Invisible to anyone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [72:26] Knower [He is] of the Unseen, what is hidden from servants, and He does not disclose, He [does not] reveal, His Unseen to anyone, from mankind,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He is) the knower of the Unseen) He knows when the chastisement will happen, (and He revealeth unto none His secret,
